jbt:adv_break_trowel_desc: Break a diamond trowel enchanted with unbreaking III
jbt:adv_experience_flask_title: Keep It Secret, Keep It Safe
jbt:adv_experience_flask_desc: Keep your experience safe by crafting an experience flask
jbt:adv_grass_starter_desc: Convert dirt to grass by crafting a grass starter
jbt:adv_hammer_desc: Mine more by crafting a hammer

jbt:adv_iron_chisel_desc: Replace blocks with new ones by crafting an iron chisel
jbt:adv_iron_trowel_desc: Place random blocks from your hotbar by crafting an iron trowel
jbt:adv_item_magnet_desc: Pull items towards you by crafting an item magnet
jbt:adv_mob_bag_desc: Move passive mobs with ease by crafting a mob bag
jbt:adv_rope_ladder_desc: Descend faster by crafting rope ladders
jbt:adv_tape_measure_desc: Measure distance with precision by crafting a tape measure
jbt:adv_void_bucket_desc: Quickly clean up spills by crafting a void bucket
jbt:adv_void_bundle_desc: Trash items on the go by crafting a void bundle
jbt:adv_wrench_desc: Rotate blocks by crafting a block wrench
jbt:adv_mining_helmet_desc: Light up the darkness by crafting a mining helmet
